amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from this bill to be used for the Office for Civil Rights and Civil Liberties of the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 247 (Roll no. 455).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 247 (Roll no. 455).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
